body:
Hi @psam3196 , thank you so much for your interest in tackling the fake news problem! It is definitely a prevalent one and one worth solving. 

Unfortunately, we are no longer maintaining the code in this repo. It was a project implemented at a hackathon a long time ago and has not been structured for actual deployment. Some dependencies have been either deprecated or have hit the free tier limit for API requests. You may be experiencing issues scraping articles because of that. We may continue developing it in the future, but as of right now it is on hold. 

I recommend checking out http://www.fakenewschallenge.org/ for more information on other models, that is where we found a lot of resources and started our research for this project (and implemented a model from).
